definition: to give as a present/to repel/to bestow an honorary title after death (old)
article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: What kind of free-gift will raise your purchasing desire?
sentences.chinese: 甚麼類型的免費贈品會提升你的購買意欲？

sentences.english: The gifts of charity meddled with a man's private affair.
sentences.chinese: 慈善團體的贈品受到了某人私人事務的干涉。

sentences.english: Original receipts must be presented before redemption at Neways Singapore Product Showcase.
sentences.chinese: 在領取贈品時必需附上收據。

sentences.english: If you are one of the first ten buyers, you'll get one give-away from us.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是前十名顧客之一，你將得到我們的一件贈品。

sentences.english: Redemption of premiums are valid in Neways Singapore Product Showcase only.
sentences.chinese: 領取贈品只限於新衛斯新加坡產品成列室。

sentences.english: Why do I never get any freebies?
sentences.chinese: 爲毛我從來沒收到過這種免費贈品？

sentences.english: Europe, America and Japan, and other developed countries have their own gifts research institutions.
sentences.chinese: 歐美日等發達國家都有自己的禮贈品研究機構。

sentences.english: In the food industry, the word 'lagniappe' is often used.
sentences.chinese: 在食品工業領域，“贈品”這個詞很常見。

sentences.english: Presents and gifts blind the eyes of judges, and make them dumb in the mouth, so that they cannot correct.
sentences.chinese: 贈品與禮物昏迷明智人的眼目，就如口罩阻止責斥。

sentences.english: The department store offered giveaways to customers with the purchase of their product.
sentences.chinese: 這家百貨公司提供贈品給來店購物的客人。

sentences.english: A free gift is given with each fill-up.
sentences.chinese: 每加滿一次油都可拿到免費贈品。

sentences.english: At the end of six weeks, we'll send you some gifts for your help. Please be very frank with us about your thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 六週後我們將有小贈品，請告訴我們您的真實想法。

sentences.english: It connects those who want to give with those in need of receiving.
sentences.chinese: 它幫助那些希望捐贈的人和需要贈品的人取得聯繫。

sentences.english: Wilhelm says sanitising products aren't just used as promotional giveaways.
sentences.chinese: 威爾漢姆提到，人們不光把清潔產品用作促銷贈品。

sentences.english: This bottle-opener is just a gift from our shop. Thank you for coming.
sentences.chinese: 謝謝您的光臨，這個開瓶器是我們店送給你的贈品。

sentences.english: It's a freebie I got at the carnival.
sentences.chinese: 這是我在嘉年華得的免費贈品。

definition: to place an order/to order/an order (of goods)
